about_the_game:
project; VIRAI: DOOMER’s LIFE ESCAPE is a visual novel with elements of horror and psychological thriller, where you take on the role of Hicha — a reclusive girl who dreams of escaping her depressive routine and improving her life.

Now you can suffer, ruin your health, and burn through your days not only in real life but also in the game!

Perform various combinations of actions in Hicha’s apartment to unlock different outcomes. Perhaps one of them will save her!

Oh, and Hicha also works as a virtual singer named Virai. Maybe it’s Virai who can help her change her life?

What to expect:

  • Hicha's life simulator where every action you take has consequences.

  • Depressive yet stunning art by the talented artist RIKANI.

  • Beautiful pixel graphics that create a unique atmosphere.

  • A branching story with 10 different endings.

  • 10 music tracks by renowned post-punk artists.

  • An original soundtrack to enhance the immersive experience.

  • A utopian virtual world, “VITA,” that offers a respite from grim reality.

Can you help Hicha escape her routine and find happiness? The choice is yours!

content_descriptors.notes: The game has a dark and gloomy atmosphere and is a psychological thriller
